title: Smart Data Models - GovGAST3
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Generic turbogas with acceleration and temperature controller.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovGAST3

bca.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Acceleration limit set-point (Bca).  Unit = 1/s.  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0.0

bp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Droop (bp).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

dtc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exhaust temperature variation due to fuel flow increasing from 0 to 1 PU (deltaTc).  Typical Value = 390. Default: 0.0

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum fuel flow (Ka).  Typical Value = 0.23. Default: 0.0

kac.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel system feedback (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kca.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Acceleration control integral gain (Kca). Unit = 1/s.  Typical Value = 100. Default: 0.0

ksi.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain of radiation shield (Ksi).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0.0

ky.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient of transfer function of fuel valve positioner (Ky).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

mnef.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel flow maximum negative error value (MN).  Typical Value = -0.05. Default: 0.0

mxef.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel flow maximum positive error value (MX).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

rcmn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum fuel flow (RCMN).  Typical Value = -0.1. Default: 0.0

rcmx.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum fuel flow (RCMX).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

tac.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel control time constant (Tac).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Compressor discharge volume time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0

td.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Temperature controller derivative gain (Td).  Typical Value = 3.3. Default: 0

tfen.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine rated exhaust temperature correspondent to Pm=1 PU (Tfen).  Typical Value = 540. Default: 0.0

tg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of speed governor (Tg).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

tsi.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of radiation shield (Tsi).  Typical Value = 15. Default: 0

tt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Temperature controller integration rate (Tt).  Typical Value = 250. Default: 0.0

ttc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of thermocouple (Ttc).  Typical Value = 2.5. Default: 0

ty.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of fuel valve positioner (Ty).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0
